name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knowt: Quizlet Import, AI Notes & Flashcards

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically import flashcards and notes from any video, PDF, article, or flashcard site. Knowt is the fastest way to study.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The only AI-powered chrome extension students need - make flashcards & summarized notes from anything on the internet & seamlessly moves your Quizlets to Knowt. 

Discover a new way of learning with Knowt, the all-in-one study app trusted by 2 million+ students. On top of our Free Learn Mode, Knowt also has unique AI features designed to save you time when studying.
